subject: Stanley Cup
Basketball
Hockey, Ice
Baseball
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The summer of 1994 included two New York teams chasing a title, a World Cup, a Bronco chase and a baseball strike. Times reporters and editors reflect on these events from 20 years ago.
snippet: The summer of 1994 included two New York teams chasing a title, a World Cup, a Bronco chase and a baseball strike. Times reporters and editors reflect on these events from 20 years ago.
